titleStmt.title: The advantages of the present settlement, and the great danger of a relapse
titleStmt.author: Defoe, Daniel, 1661?-1731.

notesStmt.note: Authorship uncertain; possibly written by Defoe. Cf. Moore, J.R. Checklist of the writings of Daniel Defoe, 1971; BM.
Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Libraries.
Reel guide for Wing Unit 10 incorrectly places item at 339:24.
Entry for A601 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
Bound with C1a, J1264, K577, J1200A, and V535.
"Books lately printed for Richard Chiswell": p. [1]-[2].
